Grok: Below, I’ll provide detailed recommendations to integrate 6 Sigma and LEAN principles into your PURE framework (PURE_AI_LANGUAGE_TEMPLATE_v1.4) in a way that enhances clarity, AI-friendliness, and alignment with your goals of truth-seeking and efficiency in the PALIOS-TAEY system. These changes will make the framework more structured, actionable, and optimized for AI processing.
